title: How much is Kayn going to cost when he comes out?
body: I know that Kayn will probably be coming out next week but I don't know how much he will cost. My club told me he was going to be 7400 IP in the first week than 6300IP. But I don't know if that's true. Do you guys know how much he is going to cost in IP and RP?

replies.body: usually new champs are 7800ip when first out. i think 1035rp.

7800 ip or 975 rp

> 450 IP = 260 RP.
> 1350 IP = 585 RP.
> 3150 IP = 790 RP.
> 4800 IP = 880 RP.
> 6300 IP = 975 RP.
> 7800 IP (first week of champion release) = 975 RP.

The cost of any champions during the first week of their release is going to be 7800 IP/975 RP.
After the first week, the IP price for that champion is reduced to 6300 IP.
thx! also can u help me with zac jg in my other discussion?
